entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
